anathema: Abuse a loyal subject, harm or kill a non-combatant
edict: Improve yourself with music and literature, take what you want, seek power above others
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Raumya (The Evil Prince)](/Deities.aspx?ID=619)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>

</traits>

**Source** [Divine Mysteries](/Sources.aspx?ID=234) pg. 322

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Vudrani Gods](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=17)

**Edicts** Improve yourself with music and literature, take what you want, seek power above others

**Anathema** Abuse a loyal subject, harm or kill a non-combatant

**Area of Concern**
Majesty, power, refinement

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Attribute](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Strength or Charisma

**Divine Font** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146) or [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Sanctification** can choose holy or unholy

**Divine Skill** [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=45)

**Favored Weapon** [Trident](/Weapons.aspx?ID=401)

**Domains** [Confidence](/Domains.aspx?ID=67), [Knowledge](/Domains.aspx?ID=80), [Might](/Domains.aspx?ID=83), [Wealth](/Domains.aspx?ID=99)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Sure Strike](/Spells.aspx?ID=1709)

- **2nd**
[Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=1577)

- **4th**
[Weapon Storm](/Spells.aspx?ID=1758)

</column>
name: Raumya (The Evil Prince)
religious_symbol: Sitar made from a human head
